comments.body: I don't think you need this `requirements` section since the import test will get all of the packages listed under `run` automatically.

I agree it won't break without it, but I thought it was best practice to put things there anyway if they're explicitly imported by `run_test.py`, since if they later get removed as runtime requirements then the test would break. At least that's what I thought [this comment](https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/blob/20d1705ea984a2cc1e190f13780b74266b3caa55/recipes/example/meta.yaml#L39) meant.
